column2: FROM [schema].utl_site INNER JOIN [schema].utl_distrib_loss_factor_sched ON utl_distrib_loss_factor_sched.dlf_id = ISNULL(utl_site.dlf_id,4) WHERE utl_distrib_loss_factor_sched.start_date < GETDATE() AND ISNULL(utl_distrib_loss_factor_sched.end_date,'9999-12-31') > GETDATE() AND (utl_site.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId  > -2 OR utl_distrib_loss_factor_sched.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId  > -2)
